code: import React from"react";import{Button}from"semantic-ui-react";export default function Pagination(_ref){var cardsPerPage=_ref.cardsPerPage,totalCards=_ref.totalCards,paginate=_ref.paginate;var pageNumbers=[];for(var i=1;i<=Math.ceil(totalCards/cardsPerPage);i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return React.createElement(Button.Group,{className:"pagination"},pageNumbers.map(function(number){return React.createElement(Button,{onClick:function onClick(){return paginate(number);},className:"page-link"},number);}));}
